body: Koreans are more conservative and strict on these things, been reading a few Korean online manga, and real incest and underage is a big nono for them.

This might be the dumbest thing I've ever read, he's 20, he doesn't know what sex or masturbation is, on top of that he acts like he's 12, if you want to make a shota manga, then make one, this guy just seems mentally retarded.

I love this Doujinshi and I fall in love to read the relationship between Dae Ho and his elder sister Mia Nuna. They are perfect together and I hope to watch a sequel when they will make official that they love each other. Also I love all the story from the first time he didn't know ho masturbate until he maturate and take controll from the other girls. This story is amazing and the graphic is one of the best I ever see in my life. If the author of this Doujinshi could read this message, please, make a sequel and make Dae Ho with Mina officially because together are amazing ❤️ also thanks again because this is my favorite doujinshi in all the world until now from both story, character and graphic ❤️❤️
